meanings.definition: The act of combining or the state of being combined.
meanings.sent1: In cooking, the right combination of ingredients can make a delicious meal.
meanings.sent2: The combination of red and blue creates the color purple.
meanings.sent3: The combination of a clown costume and a serious speech was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter and his smile were a perfect combination, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The combination of music and dance brought joy to everyone.

meanings.definition: A sequence of numbers or letters used to open a lock.
meanings.sent1: To open the safe, you need to enter the correct combination of numbers.
meanings.sent2: The lock required a specific combination to unlock it.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious note contained a secret combination to access the treasure.
meanings.sent4: The combination to the vault was known only to a few trusted individuals.
meanings.sent5: Remembering the combination to his locker was always a challenge for him.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things that work together.
meanings.sent1: The winning team had a great combination of skills and teamwork.
meanings.sent2: The combination of different tools helped them complete the project.
meanings.sent3: The combination of cats and dogs in the movie made for a hilarious scene.
meanings.sent4: Their combination of talents made them a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The combination of hard work and dedication led to their success.
